name: Netwalk (itch)
description:
Connect all tiles to the red server tile.

  • Left click: rotate counterclockwise
  • Right click: rotate clockwise
  • Middle click, Shift+Left click, or F key:  lock tile
  • Open settings menu to change puzzle size or enable color blind mode.

I always wanted a netwalk clone I could play on my phone, so I’m using that as a first Unity project. Web and downloadable version available here for free.  An iOS version is in progress.
